methods.name: findNode
methods.description: Use the findNode method to get a node from the tree view control at the specified value path.

methods.name: setValues
handleOnToggle
methods.description:
Handle function when a node is toggled / clicked.
Passes 2 attributes: the data node and it's toggled boolean state.
